title: [1.7.10][ssp/smp]遗失的书籍 Lost Books (FatherToast's Mod)
author: zhuqinghe
txt_content:
本帖最后由 zhuqinghe 于 2015-6-19 12:38 编辑 

遗失的书籍……就是战利品的一种（但不是附魔书）
打怪物会掉落一些已完成的书……天晓得谁写的
有可能是某只苦力怕在歌颂生命的短暂，某只僵尸在称赞团队的美好……
前提是，你得看得懂……都是英文的

偶尔当做冒险的消遣是不错的
我就先贴一篇上来吧


The World As We Know It
R.S. Dragon
The World As We Know It
    By R.S. Dragon

The world has changed from the days of old.
Fame and fashion are more important than gold.
With every turn is the next to stupid fad.
The great and soulful singers are replaced with those who are bad.
Drugs and woman seem a constant theme.
And your peers attack your self-esteem.
The school systems have lowered their cares.
If you give a damn about your life, you get ugly stares.
People facing constant strife.
Ending their own life with the sharp end of a knife.
Internal wars are fought in every space.
And you are still expected to put a smile on your face.
It's a pretty crappy world.
Indeed its true.
But the only one who can change it
Is you.


你萌应该有点情怀！天天打打杀杀的，为何不来本书陶冶一下情操（正经）

replies.txt_content:
zhuqinghe 发表于 2015-6-18 23:15
它读取的书籍资料不在JAR里面，是在config\LostBooks里后缀为book的文件，我也没研究过能不能改为中文 ...
无法改为中文，这个mod的原理是它会提取config文件夹的book文件，然后自动生成一些书籍，但是由于排版规则是按照英文来的，所以当你把书本汉化之后，游戏内生成书籍就会失败，然后就悲剧了，这也是我当初放弃搬运的原因
